languages.text: "Я был тяжело ранен в первой стычке, лежал еле живой. Остальные ушли на разведку, а Эммерсон остался охранять меня. Он не заметил, как я очнулся, — говорил по воксу. Все требовал повышения платы, а когда он стал диктовать наши координаты, я выстрелил ему в затылок". {n}Соломон кладет руку на голову кибермастифа.{/n} "Я решил, что живыми мы отсюда не выберемся, поэтому прицепил свой вокс с последним докладом к ошейнику Глейто и приказал ему возвращаться в штаб. Потом снова отключился, а пришел в себя уже в плену. Еретики пытали меня сутками напролет, но я продержался достаточно, чтобы дождаться Взыскателей".

"I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."
languages.original_text: "Я был тяжело ранен в первой стычке, лежал еле живой. Остальные ушли на разведку, а Эммерсон остался охранять меня. Он не заметил, как я очнулся, — говорил по воксу. Все требовал повышения платы, а когда он стал диктовать наши координаты, я выстрелил ему в затылок". {n}Соломон кладет руку на голову кибермастифа.{/n} "Я решил, что живыми мы отсюда не выберемся, поэтому прицепил свой вокс с последним докладом к ошейнику Глейто и приказал ему возвращаться в штаб. languages.text: 「戦闘で重傷を負い、床に倒れて瀕死の状態でした。部隊の他の者たちは周囲の偵察に出ていて、エマーソンだけが私の護衛として残っていました。私が意識を取り戻していることに彼は気づかず、ヴォックスで通信していたんです。もっと報酬をよこせと何度も要求しはじめ、ついには私たちの現在位置を伝え始めました。だから、彼の後頭部を撃ったんです」{n}ソロモーンはグライトの首に手を添えた。{/n}「どうせ生きては戻れないと思い、最終報告を記録しました。ヴォックスをグライトの首輪に取りつけて、司令部まで戻るよう命じたんです。それから再び気を失い、次に目が覚めたときには、もう捕まっていました。連中は何日もかけて私を拷問しましたが、耐え抜きました。そしてついに、エグザクション部隊が現れたんです」
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."

languages.text: "Ich wurde bei dem Kampf schwer verwundet und lag am Boden, kaum noch am Leben. Der Rest des Trupps erkundete draußen die Umgebung, und Emmerson blieb bei mir und hielt Wache. Er bemerkte nicht, dass ich wach war – und führte ein Gespräch über das Vox. Er verlangte mehr Bezahlung, und als er anfing, unsere Koordinaten durchzugeben, schoss ich ihm in den Hinterkopf." {n}Solomorne legt eine Hand auf Glaitos Hals.{/n} "Ich dachte, wir würden keinesfalls mehr lebend rauskommen, also nahm ich meinen letzten Bericht auf, befestigte mein Vox an Glaitos Halsband und wies ihn an, zum Hauptquartier zurückzukehren. Dann verlor ich erneut das Bewusstsein, und als ich es wiedererlangte, war ich bereits in Gefangenschaft. Die Ketzer folterten mich tagelang, aber ich hielt durch, bis der Vollstreckertrupp eintraf."
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."

Er bemerkte nicht, dass ich wach war – und führte ein Gespräch über das Vox. Er verlangte mehr Bezahlung, und als er anfing, unsere Koordinaten durchzugeben, schoss ich ihm in den Hinterkopf." {n}Solomorne legt eine Hand auf Glaitos Hals.{/n} "Ich dachte, wir würden keinesfalls mehr lebend rauskommen, also nahm ich meinen letzten Bericht auf, befestigte mein Vox an Glaitos Halsband und wies ihn an, zum Hauptquartier zurückzukehren. Dann verlor ich erneut das Bewusstsein, und als ich es wiedererlangte, war ich bereits in Gefangenschaft. Die Ketzer folterten mich tagelang, aber ich hielt durch, bis der Vollstreckertrupp eintraf."

languages.text: « J'ai été gravement blessé lors de l'affrontement et je me suis retrouvé à terre, entre la vie et la mort. Le reste de l'escouade était partie en reconnaissance, mais Emmerson est resté à mes côtés. Il n'a pas remarqué que j'avais repris connaissance, car il était absorbé par une communication-vox. Il réclamait un paiement plus important. Quand il a commencé à dicter des coordonnées, je lui ai tiré une balle dans la tête. {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant en posant une main sur la nuque de Glaito, avant de reprendre.{/n} J'ai compris que nous ne survivrions pas à cette mission. J'ai donc enregistré mon ultime rapport avant d'accrocher mon vox au collier de Glaito et de lui ordonner de retourner au quartier général. J'ai ensuite reperdu connaissance. À mon réveil, j'avais été capturé. Les hérétiques m'ont torturé pendant des jours, mais j'ai tenu jusqu'à ce que l'escouade d'exaction vienne me chercher. »
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été gravement blessé lors de l'affrontement et je me suis retrouvé à terre, entre la vie et la mort. Le reste de l'escouade était partie en reconnaissance, mais Emmerson est resté à mes côtés. Il n'a pas remarqué que j'avais repris connaissance, car il était absorbé par une communication-vox. Il réclamait un paiement plus important. Quand il a commencé à dicter des coordonnées, je lui ai tiré une balle dans la tête. {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant en posant une main sur la nuque de Glaito, avant de reprendre.{/n} J'ai compris que nous ne survivrions pas à cette mission. J'ai donc enregistré mon ultime rapport avant d'accrocher mon vox au collier de Glaito et de lui ordonner de retourner au quartier général. J'ai ensuite reperdu connaissance. À mon réveil, j'avais été capturé. Les hérétiques m'ont torturé pendant des jours, mais j'ai tenu jusqu'à ce que l'escouade d'exaction vienne me chercher. »

languages.text: «Fui malherido durante el combate; estaba tirado en el suelo, casi muerto. El resto de la escuadra se adelantó para reconocer el terreno, y Emmerson se quedó atrás para protegerme. No se dio cuenta de que estaba despierto; le oí hablando por el vocotransmisor. No dejaba de exigir un pago más alto, y cuando empezó a darles nuestras coordenadas, le disparé en la nuca». {n}Solomorne posa una mano sobre el pescuezo de Glaito.{/n} «Supuse que no saldríamos de allí con vida, así que grabé mi último informe, enganché el vocotransmisor al collar de Glaito y le ordené que volviese al cuartel general. Luego volví a desmayarme, y cuando recobré el conocimiento ya me habían capturado. Los herejes me torturaron durante días, pero logré aguantar hasta que llegó la escuadra de exacción».
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."

traits.locale_text: «Fui malherido durante el combate; estaba tirado en el suelo, casi muerto. El resto de la escuadra se adelantó para reconocer el terreno, y Emmerson se quedó atrás para protegerme. No se dio cuenta de que estaba despierto; le oí hablando por el vocotransmisor. No dejaba de exigir un pago más alto, y cuando empezó a darles nuestras coordenadas, le disparé en la nuca». {n}Solomorne posa una mano sobre el pescuezo de Glaito.{/n} «Supuse que no saldríamos de allí con vida, así que grabé mi último informe, enganché el vocotransmisor al collar de Glaito y le ordené que volviese al cuartel general. Luego volví a desmayarme, y cuando recobré el conocimiento ya me habían capturado. Los herejes me torturaron durante días, pero logré aguantar hasta que llegó la escuadra de exacción».

languages.text: “我在战斗中受了重伤，躺在地上，奄奄一息。其他队员都去侦查了，只有艾莫森留下来看着我。他并没有注意到我已经醒了，他一直在对着音阵装置说话，打算开出更高的价格。当他开始泄露我们的坐标位置时，我朝他后脑开了一枪。”{n}索罗蒙将手放在格雷托的脖子上。{/n}“当时我意识到我们必死无疑，于是我录下了最后的报告，把我的音阵装置系在格雷托的项圈上，让它返回总部，随后我就又晕了过去。等我再次醒来的时候，我已经被敌人抓住了。那些异端分子折磨了我好几天，但我一直坚持到了惩戒小队赶来。”
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."

languages.text: "Çatışmada ağır yaralandım. Yere yığılıp kaldım, hayata zar zor tutunuyordum. Manganın geri kalanı bölgeyi keşfetmeye gitmişti. Emmerson beni korumak için yanımda kaldı. Uyanık olduğumu fark etmedi, voksa konuşuyordu. Kendisine daha fazla ödeme yapılması gerektiğini söyleyip duruyordu. Koordinatlarımızı verir olunca onu ensesinden vurdum." {n}Solomorne, elini Glaito'nun boynuna koyuyor.{/n} "Oradan sağ çıkamayacağımızı anlamıştım. Bu yüzden de son raporumu kaydettim, voksumu Glaito'nun tasmasına taktım ve ona karargâha dönmesini söyledim. Sonra tekrar bayıldım. Kendime geldiğimde çoktan ellerine düşmüştüm. Kâfirler bana günlerce işkence etti ancak zapt mangası gelene kadar dayanmayı başardım."
languages.original_text: "I was badly wounded in the fight, lying on the floor, barely alive. The rest of the squad had gone to scout the area, and Emmerson stayed to guard me. He didn't notice that I was awake — he was talking over the vox. He kept demanding bigger payment, and when he started giving our coordinates, I shot him in the back of the head." {n}Solomorne places a hand on Glaito's neck.{/n} "I figured that we weren't making it out of there alive, so I logged my final report, attached my vox to Glaito's collar, and told him to return to the headquarters. Then, I passed out again, and when I came to, I had already been captured. The heretics tortured me for days, but I held on until the exaction squad arrived."
